name: Anita
description:
The game starts with the conversation between Sumili and Anita. Sumili tells Anita that there is a strange thing happened in the village, white blood flowed out from a tree.  

Sumili and Anita back to the village. Anita accidentally heard the conversation between his father and the witch. It was about the curse of Mahsuri. Then, a bunch of animals attack the village.

After the incident, the village moved to a new spot to live but after a few months, crops get destroyed by heavy rain. Anita knows something is wrong and asks about the curse. She was told that Mahsuri was accused wrongly….. After several events, the brave woman, Anita successfully removes the curse from the village and restores peace to the village.

#48 Hour Folklore Game Jam
